enhanced_by.reason: The add method requires a SortedBag to be initialized, which can be set up using the initializeSortedBag method.
Both add and addAll methods handle the addition of elements to the bag, making addAll a suitable setup method for testing add.
The remove method may need to be invoked after add to verify the state of the bag after adding an element.
The contains method can be used to verify that the element added by the add method is present in the bag.
